With mischievous eyes and sweet faces, ferrets are undeniably adorable. They are a small size and can provide your family with a sweet long-term pet. They enjoy challenging puzzles and games. Provide them with puzzle-based toys or games. Every ferret is unique and has its own personality. Some are independent, some are very cuddly, but each is an individual!

The ball python is quite simply the most popular pet python in the world. Ball pythons make for a quality pet for the first-time keeper and experienced herpetoculturists alike. With proper care, ball pythons can live 30 years or more. They are generally shy and will spend much of their time hiding.

Developed as a nod to post-war bush pilots in Canada\'s North, the Chilliwack Bomber provides the durability, warmth, and mobility that these pilots needed when working on Arctic runways. An enduringly popular and iconic style, this is one of Canada Goose\'s most beloved jackets.
